item.title: Computers get more powerful
item.description: New computers are more powerful than the computers that were around a year ago. They are also much more powerful than the computers from five years ago. If you were to compare current computers with the computers of twenty years ago you would fine they are far more powerful.

item.title: Gerry the giraffe has longest neck
item.description: Gerry the giraffe is no ordinary giraffe, Gerry is now the official world record holder for the longest neck in the world. At five meters Gerry's incredibly long neck ensures that he can reach leaves on the very highest trees in his field.

item.title: New colour pencil introduced
item.description: For many years it was forgotten. It was simply not possible to buy a pink coloured pencil. Now a leading coloured pencil manufacturer has put this right by adding a pink pencil to its range.

item.title: Pen used to draw complex charts
item.description: A pen has been used to draw complex charts for the first time. Previously it was impossible for a pen to be used to draw complex charts as the line it produced was too fat. Now for the first time a pen with a thin enough line has been produced.
